description:
Vice Admiral Keit was an admiral in the Imperial Fleet and participated in the Second Battle of Tiamat, under the command of Fleet Admiral Zieten. On 8 December 745 UC, while attempting to intercept and attack the right flank of the Alliance 4th Fleet, his fleet was attacked in its left flank by the Alliance 5th Fleet. His flagship, Embla, was hit after turning to engage and Keit was seriously wounded and lost consciousness. It is unknown whether Keit and his flagship survived the rest of the battle.
Gineipedia
name: Keit
